# displacement base brushes
[(0, 11568)] - (3168, 3456) = 
	(3168, 3456) overlap center (0, 11568)
[(0, 3168), (3456, 11568)]

[(0, 3168), (3456, 11568)] - (3600, 3744) = 
	(3600, 3744) tails (0, 3168)
	(3600, 3744) overlap center (3456, 11568)
[(0, 3168), (3456, 3600), (3744, 11568)]

Hiding ('brush', 212) | (2304, 2448) | 144 long
[(0, 3168), (3456, 3600), (3744, 11568)] - (2304, 2448) = 
	(2304, 2448) overlap center (0, 3168)
	(2304, 2448) leads (3456, 3600)
	(2304, 2448) leads (3744, 11568)
[(0, 2304), (2448, 3168), (3456, 3600), (3744, 11568)]

Hiding ('brush', 1592) | (10272, 10416) | 144 long
[(0, 2304), (2448, 3168), (3456, 3600), (3744, 11568)] - (10272, 10416) = 
	(10272, 10416) tails (0, 2304)
	(10272, 10416) tails (2448, 3168)
	(10272, 10416) tails (3456, 3600)
	(10272, 10416) overlap center (3744, 11568)
[(0, 2304), (2448, 3168), (3456, 3600), (3744, 10272), (10416, 11568)]

Hiding ('brush', 1591) | (10128, 10272) | 144 long
[(0, 2304), (2448, 3168), (3456, 3600), (3744, 10272), (10416, 11568)] - (10128, 10272) = 
	(10128, 10272) tails (0, 2304)
	(10128, 10272) tails (2448, 3168)
	(10128, 10272) tails (3456, 3600)
	# skipped past (3744, 10272)
	(10128, 10272) leads (10416, 11568)
[(0, 2304), (2448, 3168), (3456, 3600), (10416, 11568)]
